feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:21 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
